[
  '(:action find
  ; Find a resource or location and update player status
  :parameters (?p - player ?target - object ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (not (found ?p ?target)))
  :effect (and (found ?p ?target)))',
  
  '(:action collect_sticks
  ; Collect sticks from a location and update inventory
  :parameters (?p - player ?loc - location ?stick - stick)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (has_twigs_and_sticks ?loc))
  :effect (and (inventory ?p ?stick)))',
  
  '(:action collect
  ; Collect an item from a location and update inventory
  :parameters (?collector - player ?item - object ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?collector ?location) (available ?item ?location))
  :effect (and (in_inventory ?collector ?item)))',
  
  '(:action create
  ; Create an object or structure using required materials at a specified location
  :parameters (?p - player ?loc - location ?material - object ?creation - creation)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (has_material ?p ?material ?loc))
  :effect (and (at ?creation ?loc) (not (has_material ?p ?material ?loc))))',
  
  '(:action use
  ; Use an item to perform a task and update status
  :parameters (?agent - player ?item - object ?location - location ?target - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (at ?target ?location) (inventory ?agent ?item))
  :effect (and (not (inventory ?agent ?item))))'
]
